main.name: Damian Domżalski
main.description: Engineering data intelligence at Measure Studio. Building AI products on the side.
main.bio: I'm a software engineer who thrives at the intersection of data and product. At Measure Studio, I build the data pipelines and application features that power social media intelligence for major brands. On the side, I founded FirstVibe.app — an AI-powered platform that turns selfies into honest vibe scores. I care about clean architecture, thoughtful APIs, and shipping things that people actually use.

projects.title: Measure Studio
projects.description: Social media data intelligence platform trusted by top brands and agencies. I build data pipelines, analytics features, and the core application powering millions of data points daily.

projects.title: FirstVibe.app
projects.description: Upload a selfie, get your honest vibe score in 30 seconds. AI-powered selfie analysis platform I built from zero to launch.
